data.name: Knight Jones and Dragons Fall
data.detailed_description:
In a far, far Kingdom peaceful towns are being attacked by hungry and merciless dragons. Every knight took an oath to protect the Kingdom, but most of them died gloriously in battles with neighbour peaceful Kingdom. You are the only lonely knight who continues to fulfill the oath and travel from town to town with the only mission: to protect and to serve.

As the most humble of all knights you don't take money for the hard labour, just gold nuggets. And as it wasn't bad enough the hideous plot surfaces with you in the epicenter! Uncover the treacherous deception and save the Kingdom!

Features:
- Third-person shooter in medieval fantasy kingdom.
- Shoot dragons using bows, crossbows and ballistae.
- Travel from castle to castle and protect them from dragon attacks.
- Spend your rewards to upgrade your weapons and equipment.
- If you're skillful enough, you can take the dragon under control!

Be the Hero! Save everyone!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Protect innocent people from evil dragons as the most noble and humble of all knights. Uncover the treacherous deception and save the Kingdom (optionally you can marry the prince/princess afterwards).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

movies.name: Knight Jones and Dragons Fall Trailer

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains strong language, blood and gore and drinking wine.
